name: Bye Ember
description:
Survive as the last Ember Bot and explore the abandoned sites as you try to figure out your purpose amidst the hostile environment.

Protect your Flame no matter the cost!

Cold Weather will deplete your Health!

Replenish your Fire with Fig Branches scattered all over the area.

Consume the Saxifrage Flower to become impenetrable!

Created for the Make-A-Level Game Jam (Leap Day 2020) with the "Incongruous" theme. So the idea of a lone fire keeper in an icy world was born!

Gameplay & design inspired by classic games Super Mario and Megaman Zero.

You can show your support by following me on my social media:

 Twitter @polysplitgames

 Facebook @polysplitgames

Thanks and hope you guys have fun!

Keyboard Controls:

A & D or Left & Right Keys - Movement
Space or W or Up Button - Jump
Shift (Hold) - Run

Joystick Controls:

Left Stick or Directional Pads - Movement
A  Button or Up Directional - Jump
X Button or Right Bumper (Hold) - Run
